title: Scoop to Kill
description: Read Wendy Lyn Watson's blogs and other content on the Penguin Community. A sleuth sure to melt readers' hearts-from the author of I Scream, You Scream   During the local college's annual Honor's Day festivities, a graduate student is killed. When the English professor suspected of his murder also meets an untimely end, Tallulah Jones steps out from behind the counter of Remember the a-la-Mode to clear the professor's name-before anyone else gets put on ice...
author: Wendy Lyn Watson
